title: A1398 Mid 2014 Random auto shut-down
message:
- MLB was liquid damaged initially with auto shut-down issue
- MLB side KBD backlight connector, PowerGUD section and Thunderbolt section were affected
- Cleaned affected areas and replaced couple of burnt/corroded components
- Ran ASD EFI before completing repair, test passed
- After a month, the device developed same issue. Inspected MLB under microscope, clean
- Ran ASD EFI, found 3 errors. Result screen shot attached below

Need help in fixing this.

title: A1398 Mid 2014 Random auto shut-down
message: Start changing FDMF6808N chips, like any A1398 board...
